short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: changes the word PDK to Automatic Transmission

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the word "PDK" with "Automatic Transmission" on any web page. This is a very simple utility for Porsche people. It's sort of a gimmick. For those of us who believe that the PDK is nothing but an automatic transmission, this extension changes the words on a web page to reflect that. Definitely good for a laugh. That's all it does. It's very basic.
